mappings.notes: A Zenoh get() query against a queryable (e.g., mission planner) maps to a read Task in Portarium when issued as part of an automation workflow.
A declared Publisher used to send robot commands maps to a Task (command issuance). Safety: HumanApprove for motion keyspaces.
A Zenoh Session represents a robot peer in the fleet network. Map to Asset for connectivity and identity tracking.
KeyExpressions are the addressing primitives; ExternalObjectRef used to anchor topic paths in task parameters and cockpit filters.
Individual telemetry samples are streaming data; ExternalObjectRef for cockpit telemetry panels.
Query replies are response artefacts linked as ExternalObjectRefs from their parent Task.
Active subscribers are telemetry channel refs linked from robot Asset records for inventory.
